page.title: 04Langtoft Primary School
page.content: In the Summer Term at{Langtoft {School}1985 there were 31 children all together.The teachers are Mr.Bailey, the Headteacher,Mrs.Bennison,who is part time and Mrs.Hughes,who teaches the Infants. There are 16 children in the nursery and 11 in the playgroup.We have a netball,a football,cricket and a unihoc team.We have had an extension and in it there are indoor toilets,a store room,a big cloak room and a store room.We have 3 dinner ladies, Mrs Coulson,Mrs Dowson and Mrs Dixon,who come and set the tables and serve us.Mrs Dowson is also the school secretary.She arrives at 9:15 and leaves at about 2:30.At school we do lots of activites and every year we go on a school journey with Beswick School.Mrs Lepper and her assistant, Miss Paine,run the nursery.
